website_summaries.verdict: If you carry bulky equipment or uniforms to the gym, this bag is for you. The central compartment is especially generous.
pros: Amazing amount of storage space compared to gym bags twice the price
Separate zippered compartments for wet and dry clothes, plus a generous center compartment and shoe storage
cons: Looks more like a hiker's duffel bag than a gym bag at first
Inexpensive material may not tolerate rough handling

customer_reviews.title: I will keep it for another use since it seems like a nice bag overall
customer_reviews.text: The dimensions are off by a few inches if you want 25" inches of interior space this has about 20" inches. I think there should be more detail of inside, and out dimensions. I had 2 boxes that are about 25 inches back to back there is no way they are going in this bag. I will keep it for another use since it seems like a nice bag overall , not too much money, but not quite the size I thought. Just so you know I will add Photo.
customer_reviews.author: G. Brunelli

customer_reviews.title: HUGE FLAW!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so the bag itself is fine. Its spacious it has nice pockes and it feels like its studily made. BUT! (And this is a big one) the metal attachment for the shoulder strap is ABSOLUTE GARBAGE! I wouldn't suggest buying this unless you 1) don't mind the broken strap. 2) have a means to fix that problem. Or 3) like to carry it by hand. A quick side note you can buy an incredibly sturdy replacement for it at home depot, its usually where the keys are.
customer_reviews.author: Steven teran

customer_reviews.title: Normally I backpack and road trip. Went on a ...
customer_reviews.text: Normally I backpack and road trip. Went on a fly-there weekend camping trip to Sequoia from the Midwest and needed a way to pack enough for 2 people to camp, hike, and road trip from 60F to 25F. And carry tire chains too...all to say, I wasn't gentle with these. They are... utilitarian. Fancy no. Let me carry 40Lbsx2 through LAX without worrying? Yes. If you need a workhorse duffel, these will meet your needs. I didn't have any trouble with the metal strap rings others have noted. Also, they fit a lot.
customer_reviews.author: J B.Top Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: A workhorse when you mod it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this six years ago. Only recently has it started to actually show wear. The inner dividers have started to tear, and a few spots have started to wear at the bottom. I had the same issue many others have mentioned; the wire loops for the shoulder strap started to fail. I replaced them with these:  Second, I cut a piece of 1/8th-inch fiberboard into parts that fit snugly in the bottoms of the three main compartments. Kept it protected and shaped. Worth every penny. My new bag has a hell of a legacy to live up to.
customer_reviews.author: Rick C.

customer_reviews.title: HAS A STRONG CHEMICAL/PROCESSING ODOR
customer_reviews.text: For the price, bag seems constructed well. It's very roomy - you're likely to end up with more bag than you need. However, bag has a strong chemical smell, almost a fume. I bought two of these and both bags had the strong odor. I sprayed them with a disinfectant and aired them out overnight, outside. The odor is better, but still there. Fortunately, I'm using these for camera and fishing gear, not clothes. I wouldn't put my clothes in these.
customer_reviews.author: William Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Great size for camp
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these in several colors for summer camp. This was the perfect size for a one week trip. I was able to get enough clothing, including hiking clothes, bathing suits, pajamas, shorts, socks, different shoes, everything I could think of that they might need. Then we hid a couple of stuffed animals in the bags. They were also able to get small blankets in. We didn't use the outside pockets at all so they could use them for dirty socks and underwear. (Apparently they decided those would be better stuck in with their clean clothes. Oh, well.)
customer_reviews.author: Trouble

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Update: they sent me the proper bag and it is pretty good for the price TLDR: wrong size, make, color Description claims 25 x 12 x 12 Received 16 x 10 x 10 Not an everest bag but dalix instead Pictured is a bag with mostly blue on the top with a bit of black on the bottom, the bag i received is mostly black on the bottom with a bit of blue on top
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Durable Zippers!
customer_reviews.text: This bags is more than roomy enough for my needs (getting my gear to the dialysis clinic and back) and, unlike the one I purchased from Walmart, these zippers work great and have held up thus far. The zippers on my old bag were catching all the time and finally, the top zipper simply failed and I could not open the bag. I was so desperate to get at my gear that I had to resort to cutting the bag open with a knife. It was an embarrassment. This one has worked every time I have used it and I am quite pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Selene

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Do Not buy this. It is a POS. The first time we used it, the shoulder strap ripped out. It says there is a "lifetime" warranty, but, we have to pay to mail it back AND send a check for them to mail it back to us. That totaled more than we paid for it. Wrote to the company and they never responded. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Lee

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Received this bag about a week ago. I purchased this for a weekend trip. When I packed this bag I started to zip the zipper and the zipper tore from the seam. Would not zip and I was left with no weekend bag. If the zipper had not torn it would have been a great weekend bag. It has plenty of room. Wish I could of at least gotten to use it at least once.
customer_reviews.author: Delilah Larimore

customer_reviews.title: bad quality - broke on first use.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible - it broke my first time using it. I bought this to use as carry on luggage. I didn't put any more than about 10lbs in the bag, and as I was walking to my flight, I heard a snap. I couldn't tell what it was at first, but I later saw that the clasp for the shoulder strap had snapped. One half of it was still holding on, so it didn't fall to the ground. I returned it, and I'm going to look for something that was made a bit more study.
customer_reviews.author: King DingDong

customer_reviews.title: Have had it for less than a year and agree ...
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for less than a year and agree with those complaining about the metal clasp that is connected to the shoulder strap. My son just used the bag to go to the gym and the clasp would spread apart, dig into the fabric and cause it to fray. Very irritating when the shoulder strap would continually slip out. To have Everest evaluate, you'd have to ship it back to them on your own dime, include a check for $9.50 to have them either repair or replace and return to you...totally not worth the hassle. Suggest that you pay more money for something that is more solidly made.
customer_reviews.author: A. Young

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste the money on this. Spend a little more and get bettter quality!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get the bag and see that it is so spacious, and I liked that about it. BUT....Unfortunately, it only took a week or two before the shoulder strap gave out. the metal clasps on the shoulder strap should be stronger. They come apart in the middle allowing the strap to come off and the metal clasp rips a hole in the fabric. I had to take a strap from one of my old duffel bags to replace it. I was NOT happy that a brand new bag came apart so easily.
customer_reviews.author: toonicetammy

customer_reviews.title: Strap fell off immediately
customer_reviews.text: The bag itself is a good size with spacious pockets at the end. It does have a hole in it after one use but it was packed with heavy and unwieldy stuff so that might be understandable. My issue, though, is with the strap and the rings that hold the strap on the bag - the rings had disengaged themselves and the strap fallen off before I had even left my apartment block. I'm now looking to see if I can find replacement rings and strap (despite the issue with the hole) but not sure it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: Holds all kinds of things!
customer_reviews.text: This is most excellent for holding shorts, pants, dress slacks, dresses, socks, shirts, blouses, underpants, overpants, jackets, swim trunks, belts and even hats! I do not recommend putting dirty shoes in it as it will make your clothing dirty. Also I do not recommend putting fish in it as it does not hold water very well. Also, cattle do not fit in it very well, though mine did enjoy looking at it and trying to eat it. It was also insufficiently large to hold my pickup.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: ... and we were hoping this one would be a good size. It's perfect
customer_reviews.text: The 12 year old needed a new bag for her Martial Arts gear and we were hoping this one would be a good size. It's perfect. She has room for her sparring gear in the center portion and can stash her gi in one side pocket and other items in the other side. I saw other reviews with concerns about the shoulder strap breaking but we have been using it for a while now and haven't had that issue, perhaps because the gear is pretty lightweight. Overall, very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: B.Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Very very large
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the large - and IT IS VERY BIG! Nice bag for my sports child (basketball, volleyball, track, etc.) It is big enough to fit all three sports in at once! LOL She doesn't take it to every practice yet, but I can keep all her stuff in one place and easy to access. I bought because I believe in consolidation - all in one! Bookbag, clothes, ipads, lunch bag - all in one. The large can fit it all. I read the reviews about the broken strap clips so I bought some neon zip ties to reinforce - and nothing has broken! And that is saying something because me teen can break anything!
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Fatal flaw.
customer_reviews.text: Most of the bag works fine, but the metal part that comes with it constantly breaks off. The design of the bag makes it impossible to find a replacement piece, and it ends up being cheaper to just buy another one of these bags. How disappointing. It makes the shoulder strap completely unusable for any more than 15 pounds, which is unfortunately what I bought this for. Creator needs to manufacture better metal pieces (it's the same one that every negative review speaks about) and sell them separately. Or, make the connecting fabric's hole to be bigger so customers can use other things like carabiners to fasten the strap to the bag.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Great....except for those darn clips...
customer_reviews.text: Pros : - Bag is big - Construction seems durable - It's purple Cons : - As so many people have mentioned, the metal clips that the shoulder straps pull apart and warp very easily! The bag still gets three stars from me, since I bought it aware that this would be an issue. I unstitched the webbing and replaced those clips with welded D-rings. It was a 10-15 minute repair job to get a fully functioning strap. I highly recommend doing this if you want to get this bag!
customer_reviews.author: L. Lusti

customer_reviews.title: Good bag crappy strap
customer_reviews.text: As most people have said the ring loops for the shoulder strap are worthless. The bag itself seems to be holding up well and I am satisfied except for the crappy design flaw of the strap. UPADATE: Used this thing everyday and the zippers have held up and no holes or breaks in the stitching. I am also loading this thing up about 50 lbs so it is being put to the test in my opinion. Aside from the design flaw in the strap I would buy again for sure. For this I have increased my star rating to 3.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: I picked up this bag and didn't read the reviews ...
customer_reviews.text: I picked up this bag and didn't read the reviews. The metal rings that hold the shoulder strap to the bag isn't welded together so it'll pull apart when the bag is full and on your shoulder. I've had the bag for not even a week and I took it shopping to bring some stuff home. Wasn't more than 12 lbs and walking about 2 or 3 miles and the rings pulled apart. I didn't want to buy a more expensive, flashy adidas or nike bag but I'd rather spend the money to get something that will actually stay together than a cheap bag that falls apart in a week. You've been warned.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Kirchgraber

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Very durable!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great! I travel a lot on the weekends, so I was looking for a durable weekend bag that could hold a lot since I like to pack a lot of clothes. I've taken it on 5 trips already, and it still looks new. It holds everything that I could possible need (including shoes, clothes, and bathroom supplies), and I like the ability to carry the bag in hand or over the shoulder. It's definitely very large which is what I wanted, but if you pack light, you might want to look for something smaller. Overall great product!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Von Handorf

customer_reviews.title: There are only showering items like shampoos and lotions and some clothes of change
customer_reviews.text: After the first use, one of the metal hook was bent and slipped out while I'm carrying it. The bag then dropped onto the ground. There are only showering items like shampoos and lotions and some clothes of change. The quality is so questionable and I wonder if there are any service there. Since I'm looking for a long time since last month to see how to contact them. I have to leave a comment about it since I can't find any other way to contact the seller, oh it's on Prime so can't find the factory. anyway hope they can provide replacement parts for that. otherwise the bag will be useless.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Zhou

customer_reviews.title: Beware of Cheap Zipper
customer_reviews.text: When the bag arrived I was quite please with it. The one thing I did not think about though was the zipper or its quality. After less than 90 days the plastic zipper has busted on the bag. It is past the 45 day return mark and I have wasted my money. I will not purchase this bag again nor can I recommend this gym bag to anyone. The bag its self is of good quality no doubt but the zipper is very poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lora Nation

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Not heavily used though.
customer_reviews.text: Using this as my wife's range bag. It is loaded pretty heavily, but goes from the house to car, then car to range. Then the reverse. Haven't been using it enough to gauge it's long term durability, but seems to be good enough for the task and often good enough really is good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Chess

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking bag!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag for truck driver husband. He likes it because it holds a whole weeks worth of clothes & misc items. It seems very durable upon arrival but his is starting to fray around the edges already; perhaps from being jammed in small spaces in the truck.
customer_reviews.author: Donni

customer_reviews.title: Good bag. Bad shoulder strap rings.
customer_reviews.text: The build quality of the bag is good, but the side rings to hold the larger shoulder strap are not well designed. By the second time I used it the rings were falling off, but the third time one got lost and I now have to look for a replacement. When I look at other similar bags that I own they all have hard plastic rings that cannot be removed or fall off the bag. Maybe they were trying to make this bag seem a higher quality by using metal rings, but they should have been fixed on the bag. Otherwise the quality of the bag and the pockets are good,
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader with a Bit of Tech

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bag for the gym
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag for the gym. It has tons of storage so I can fit all my weight lifting gear in it with a ton of extra room to spare. I could probably even fit a couple pairs of extra clothes and a couple pairs of shoes with my gym stuff if I wanted to. Seems sturdy so far and I love it. The only negative thing, which isn't that big of a deal really but the clip on the strap is kind of sharp and if its not seated right it can scratch you pretty good but other than that great bag!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle H.

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and Strong
customer_reviews.text: I am really pleased with this bag. It's really sturdy and spacious. I fit 4 outfits, two pairs of shoes, underwear, a fan, kindle fire, chargers and stuff, plus make up and toiletries. And my clothes are not small! I am a big girl. There are separate sections for shoes on each side of the bag, with plenty of room in them. It IS large and a little bulky. But it's worth it to have everything I need in one bag.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: It's okay with a few eventual modifications
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It's inexpensive. The zippers of the main compartment can fit a combination lock. Cons: - You might need to jerry-rig the strap eventually. The loop metal that connects the ends of the strap to the bag are easily bent. Mine bent out of shape under not-too-heavy loads and bending it back was not a durable solution. I would try running a keychain ring through the canvas loop: difficult to do, but probably made easier the bigger the keychain ring. - The outside compartments cannot be locked, as there is only one zipper for each compartment.
customer_reviews.author: WA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great! Very roomy with separate compartments. We're visited a health club where we go to the gym, swim, and play miscellaneous activities. I have to pack for both me and my daughter. I can fit: 2 towels, bathing suits, cover ups, pool toys, goggles, gym shoes, shower sandals, water bottles, change of clothing for 2, and all of our shower and beauty supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth H.

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made
customer_reviews.text: Great size and great bag. I wouldn't suggest the black one because you look like a terrorist carrying it around. We use it to carry around pickleball equipment. It holds about 12 paddles in the middle part and 24 balls in each of the end sections. It seems like it will last a long time. I just wish I had gotten a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Bloomy

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. It seems to be great quality for the price. I needed a quick answer for a spontaneous trip and I didn't have a ton of cash. The pockets are functional and the bottom has that flat support thing in the bottom of the bag. The zipper seems to be sturdy as well so if you're a overstuffer you will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: be gentle
customer_reviews.text: The bag is decent size. it is a bit flimsy and I try to be extra careful not to be to rough on it so it will last a while. After a few weeks the metal bracket on the shoulder strap fell off. I was able to find it and tried to put it back on and bend it so it would stay but it just opened back up and fell off again. Other than that all seems and zippers still work.
customer_reviews.author: Prime addict

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: One and only Reason I don't hate it is only because the size is right otherwise I have the same problems like so many others that purchased this product - it broke on the first trip to the gym! the side hook broke! I had expectations for this bag - I needed it and remember the product name "everest" and it meant quality.
customer_reviews.author: ED2

customer_reviews.title: It has two side zipper pouches that are also a great size. There is a shoulder strap that you ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag has amble room to hold just about anything. It has two side zipper pouches that are also a great size. There is a shoulder strap that you can attach to the bag. I saw the other reviews where some had said that the attachment to the bag came off. The same thing happened to me. All I had to do with bend the metal back into the strap that is attached to the bag. The bag isn't made of the highest quality. I wouldn't recommend using this bag to fly with if you plan to check it. I don't see it lasting at all this way.
customer_reviews.author: Sue T.

customer_reviews.title: I would probably love this bag if my husband didn't see it first ...
customer_reviews.text: I would probably love this bag if my husband didn't see it first after it was delivered. He saw it, asked to "barrow it"...I had to order another one for myself. I'm waiting for it to arrive (which the first one was on time, so I expect the same from the new one). It looked a lot sturdier than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Scar teacher

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: This bag is spacious, I can fit my swim suit, sneakers, gym clothes, and shower gear, and I still have room to spare. I am 5'2" and I can carry the bag over my shoulder or across my chest easily, and the handles are comfortable. The bag folds easily for storage, and it is water resistant. The bag is easy to carry, unlike some gym bags that I have encountered, this one isn't cumbersome. I also love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke in first week
customer_reviews.text: One side of the zipper broke the first week! The second side broke a week later. This bag was purchased to keep karate gear in. It was not treated poorly, but this zipper must have been made on a Friday at 4:59 before a holiday weekend. I gave it a couple stars because I love the size and pockets. Color is awesome. I really would have loved this bag if it was usable, but a bag without a zipper is worthless. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bag!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful bag! Middle compartment had enough room for a small blanket, sweatpants, raincoat and a couple of sweaters. End compartments held a pair of shoes in each, along with a pair of slippers. Love that it has both handles and a shoulder strap to carry it. I treated the outside with a water repellant spray to protect items in case of rain.
customer_reviews.author: j.selbo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy for football gear.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for my ten year old. He loves it. It’s larger than I thought it would be just by looking at the pictures. He uses it for weekend overnight stays and is going to use it during football season for his gear. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: I love my new Everett Luggage and use mine to house ...
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Everett Luggage and use mine to house all the products ( and there are many bottles of cleaners ,polishes, applicators and microfiber cloths ) I need in detailing my new Honda Accord Coupe .. great size and the perfect accessory
customer_reviews.author: Tom Merritt

customer_reviews.title: Well made bag...holds a lot too!
customer_reviews.text: This bag holds a lot! I packed it full for an extended stay away from home and was able to fit all my stuff in it....and I'm not a light packer! It's a heavy canvas and the straps seemed well attached. If it's anything like my last Everest bag I know it will last for many years....we still have the other bigger Everest bag!! I really like the orange too. It's not too bright and something different.
customer_reviews.author: Pattiwhack

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for a great price. I was surprised at the quality of the bag. I needed a bag in a hurry for an upcoming trip so I saw this one on Amazon for a decent price so I decided to try it. The bag worked out great. I definitely would purchase this bag again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Gandulla

customer_reviews.title: Double failure at the shoulder strap linkage.
customer_reviews.text: At first glance, this was the perfect carry on bag for my flight home. It has a spacious main compartment with two side pockets, all threewoth zippers. It can be handheld or carried with the shoulder strap. However, the day after receiving the bag, the metal connection between the bag and the shoulder strapped failed under the stress of a couple books and clothes. The bag was about 3/4 full. I fixed the linkage quickly with a rope. A week later on my way back from the trip. The other side failed as well. It seems that this product can barely hold any weight using the shoulder strap.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Jan

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. Shoulder pad ripped off within 20 minutes of me having it on my shoulder. The bag itself is super thin. Just waiting for the next thing to rip. Only good thing I will say is the size is perfect for week long trips.
customer_reviews.author: vince tankersley

customer_reviews.title: Straps are cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bag for my oldest son. Let me start with the positives. The bag is very roomy and has lots of zipper compartments which are great for organization. The very first time that we used this bag, the metal price that the shoulder strap attaches to bent and came off of the bag (the bag was lightly packed). My husband had the bend the metal so that it would stay attached. Spend the money on a more quality item that will last.
customer_reviews.author: Letsgopens

customer_reviews.title: At this price point- I don’t expect the best quality bag that will last for years
customer_reviews.text: At this price point- I don’t expect the best quality bag that will last for years. But I was very disappointed the bag ripped open the very first time I packed it! I stuffed a sleeping bag inside- it was a tight fit, but a very large section split open on the seam. My mom sewed it back up with durable upholstery thread- and I’m hoping I can get at least a few trips out of this duffle before it goes in the trash. We’ll see.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag. Would have given it 5 stars if the end sections had 2 zippers that could meet in the middle. I like to keep my vitamins and toiletries in the ends and they’re either open or closed. I solved the problem with safety pins. Now I can have just the top of those open if that makes any sense-so stuff isn’t falling out
customer_reviews.author: carebear7951

customer_reviews.title: Metal buckle fell off after very little use
customer_reviews.text: This bag is really spacious, with multiple compartments for you to organize your stuff. But one of the metal buckles (that you clip the shoulder strap to) fell off after very little use. I bought it for a recent trip, got it to the airport fine, and once i arrived at my destination, walked around a bit while carrying the bag using the shoulder strap. About 2-3 hours into it, the buckle fell off, and now I can't use the shoulder strap, which makes this thing significantly less useful. So the bag basically didn't survive its first trip...
customer_reviews.author: telson

customer_reviews.title: The strap is at a perfect length and is adjustable
customer_reviews.text: When is says large it means large. You can fit about 2 - 3 basketballs inside this thing. With room for shoes in the side pockets and a towel with small soap bottle. The strap is at a perfect length and is adjustable. I'm 6'0 and its seems a little long to me at the longest. The bag does fit in lockers but not some more than others. If you find yourself with a thin tall locker you're going to have to either squish it in or lay it sideways to fit. Other than that its perfect for what i use it for and gets the job done. Which is gym and clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bag in three colors. Each one worked great. Some people noticed a plastic smell--after keeping them open for a couple days, that smell goes away entirely--anything you order that has a vinyl interior coating will smell like that. Wasn't an issue at all. The zippers worked great, the construction is tough. Large enough to pack for one person four days of clothes. NOT A GYM BAG unless you're packing all your sports gear as well. For travel and overnighters it's super.
customer_reviews.author: April McGowan

customer_reviews.title: Good size, great bag for trips.
customer_reviews.text: I am dumbfounded by people who said this bag is too small. It isn't huge, but unless you plan on hauling your German Shepherd around in it, it is certainly more than adequate for a 2-3 day business trip. It is a tad large for small regional jet overhead compartments, and if you fly a lot of small 50 person passenger jets, this is a bit large. Oh yes, it will fit in the overhead storage areas on these planes, but you might get a few dirty looks! For the price it is a great bag.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Looks are a little deceiving but overall a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three of these bags, blue, black and orange. Each withstood a 10 day camping experience. Material is a little flimsy and the main storage space is a little smaller than you’d think due to the larger size of the side pockets but they held everything I needed for the trip. Overall, for the price, they are good bags. I hope they last for at least a couple more trips!
customer_reviews.author: Geof Wampler

customer_reviews.title: Successful Christmas Present!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag for my dad as a Christmas Present, he takes it to work with him every day. He loved how durable the bag was, the color, how large it was, and the many pockets. He said he received quite a few compliments when he returned to work. Great bag so far!
customer_reviews.author: KPW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bag
customer_reviews.text: Very specious bag. I used it to fly back from TN as my carry-on. Let's just say I'd over packed for my trip to TN and needed a large bag to haul home my belongings. This bag still had space after I removed items from my checked bag that was overweight to bring it to 50 lbs. Every items was in perfect condition, even after they made me check it to my final destination. (Granted, one less thing for me to keep up with. The side pockets are a perfect size. I'd recommend this bag to anyone. Also, the colors were as pictured. Spot on!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong tobacco like smell
customer_reviews.text: Strong tobacco like smell I bought several of this bags, different colors for my sport travel family. However the grey one came with a strong smell, probably tobacco. I should have returned it but forgot. The smell went away after washing it and letting it outside for several days.
customer_reviews.author: Thierry T

customer_reviews.title: not as durable as it could be
customer_reviews.text: used every day for gym and work clothes. good set up with pockets. but "rings" for the shoulder strap have bent so that they will not stay (i rebent them to make it work)...board in bottom was destroyed after a couple of months...vinyl lining is flaking off all over the bag. though it still works, it is really falling apart after about a year's use.
customer_reviews.author: washingtonian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for 3-5 days trip
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for 3-5 days trip. Light weight and this bag holds everything! Just got back from field trip with this bag. Side pockets are useful to hold extra sandals/watershoes/books/little essentials, etc. Did not use the shoulder strap since I already had too many things on my shoulder for this trip. Front pocket with zipper is useful to hold paperwork. I bought two bags of different color, one is for my daughter (10 year old) who is going on the same field trip but different days. Will see how it holds for her. Will update later.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D.

customer_reviews.title: Over packed!
customer_reviews.text: My oldest travels a lot and I got her an orange luggage set but it didn’t come with a duffle bag which she claimed she so “ desperately needed” so I ordered this one, the color matched perfectly looks like it came with the set plus she can over pack it as always...
customer_reviews.author: TK Brown

customer_reviews.title: I love the price
customer_reviews.text: I love the price. I love the size. The shoulder strap is problematic. I bought a few of these for easy luggage on road trips. Great in the trunk. The shoulder straps metal rings are not completely closed. one came loose of the strap snagged on my jacket when I picked up the bag and ripped my jacket. I had to use pliers to get the ring put back into the strap and mostly closed before I could use the shoulder strap again. The damage to the jacket made it a total loss.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob W. D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: The bag is great but a little rough. It's a good size and can carry more than you actual need. Only down side is that the clips on the sides will break off, it's really cheap! I made my own hole with a different clip, hopefully it ll last.
customer_reviews.author: JonJon

customer_reviews.title: Works for football gear
customer_reviews.text: We are using it for a football bag. It holds the gear nicely. The bigger the pads are the tighter they fit but still works. Just have to put the helmet inside the pads first then in the bag. Nice room on the sides for other items.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Barney

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: It’s bigger than what I expected, but is absolutely awesome. I am able to keep a blanket along with clothes, toiletries and work out gear for my work all together. It has two side compartments that I use for shoes so I don’t have to worry about my stuff getting dirty. Absolutely love!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great for "few day" trip.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for the price. It seems to be made from quality material. Not sure how long it will last, but for the price you could purchase a new one if needed. This is a great "few day" bag. Central compartment for clothes, one end compartment for an extra pair of shoes, and the other end for toiletries, hair dryer, etc. works great. I am not sure if you could use this bag for a carry on (may be considered oversize), but I have used a similar one, and did not have an issue.)
customer_reviews.author: Jim Wings

customer_reviews.title: Issues with Strap Staying on the Bag
customer_reviews.text: It has plenty of space but I have to carry my very bulky uniform and boots which can get very heavy and the straps started coming off. The bar that goes into the loop to attach the strap to the bag keeps coming out. The photo attached show where I tried to re-attch the strap to the loop but now it is stuck halfway on and halfway off...
customer_reviews.author: Mellany

customer_reviews.title: Substantial Multi-Purpose Tote
customer_reviews.text: When I received this bag I thought I might have been sent the wrong one. Turns out, it's really easy to fold this down to a small, compact package. I doubt I will ever need to do that, but it's nice to know that for storage you have that option. It's a well-made sports bag with plenty of pockets and compartments. The zippers are good quality and the handles and straps substantial enough for whatever you might need to put in it short of bricks or weights. It's already passed the airline baggage handler test a couple of times with no problems. Great value for the money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Rex

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag and very durable
customer_reviews.text: I have a few of these bags in different colors and I love them. They are very durable and they hold a ton of clothes, etc. I know some people may frown on getting a bag like this that is so cheap, but I do highly recommend buying them. I have gotten so many compliments from people during my travels. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: aeohlojr

customer_reviews.title: Glad I kept it!
customer_reviews.text: I had originally purchased this bag to hold my earthquake emergency supplies, but it ended up being too big for that purpose. I kept it anyway and recently put it to great use on a 4 day outdoor education trip I was chaperoning. It was perfect for the trip. I like the two medium-big compartments on the sides to keep my shoes, toiletries, and other smaller items organized. The big center compartment was great for my clothes, small pillow, and small sleeping bag (ultralight bag, so about the size of a lady's shoe box). So while it was too big for my emergency kit, it's a rather nice bag for short trips and I'm very glad that I kept it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin P

customer_reviews.title: Not the most durable
customer_reviews.text: I used this bag to travel to and from work stays. The bag lasted maybe a month before it started wearing though the corners. the straps held up and zippers still work.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Warranty Pretty Useless.
customer_reviews.text: The bag is too floppy to be very useful and the flat bottom support won't stay in place. The zipper on the front snapped almost immediately (cheap metal) but the "lifetime warranty" isn't worth anything because I'd have to mail the bag back to Everest *and* pay them about $9.50 for return shipping. Pretty worthless for a $20 gym bag. I had misgivings about ordering a bag unseen and I should have listened to those. I wouldn't recommend this bag to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: M. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great Gym Bag.
customer_reviews.text: Good design for general gym use. Bag is cavernous! Have also used this bag for quick overnight travel. Sturdy construction using quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: Loved traveling with it
customer_reviews.text: I was traveling for 2 weeks and didnt want to roll around with a suitcase. This was lightweight and had ample side pocket. Very roomy. And sturdy. Good price for its quality. Update: travelled again by plane and it fit enough clothes for me and my baby. It also passes tsa checked bag and carryon
customer_reviews.author: Beachbummama

customer_reviews.title: Cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: This bag is not well made. It has room to hold a substantial amount of gear, but it is not up to the task. The bag is made of very light weight materials. After using it for only 2 months, for maybe 8 times, less than 4 hours of actually carrying it, one of the shoulder strap clips broke. There was less than 10 lbs of clothing in the bag when it broke. Don't buy this bag.
customer_reviews.author: settles

customer_reviews.title: A great bag for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, roomy bag. The zippers very are sturdy. My 12-yr-old son is hard on everything and I fully expected the bag to come back home [from his camping] trip in pieces. I was stunned that it held up so nicely. There were no rips, jammed zippers, or broken parts. Even the rubber feet on the bottom were still in tact. I purchased this bag on the cheap because expecting to throw it away after one or two uses. Much to my pleasant surprise, I think this bag will hold it's own for many years to come. A great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Large and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Larger than I expected but work perfect for my daughter for a 2 week trip. It seems to hold up very well to the abuse a 15 year old puts it through.
customer_reviews.author: kb2004

customer_reviews.title: If you need the shoulder strap don't even waste your time with this
customer_reviews.text: The price fits the quality. The metal anker that the clip clips to is just bent metal that has a weak point and will snap after short amount of usage with only 20lb of weight. If you need the shoulder strap don't even waste your time with this. It broke on me after a day or two of travel :/
customer_reviews.author: SomeDude

customer_reviews.title: Good bag
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this bag yet but it seems to be good quality. I wish the different compartments had two zippers as opposed to one. Hopefully it will be durable over time.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Very large, sturdy and well-constructed bag!
customer_reviews.text: I wondered about the quality of this bag because the price was so good. I'm happy to say that it's a very well-constructed and sturdy bag. It's also quite large. My wife can fit a karate gi, shoes, and sparring gear just in the main compartment. The side compartments can hold a good amount of other things, such as water bottle, phone, etc. It will also be used for travel. Far exceeds our expectations!
customer_reviews.author: RevRyan

customer_reviews.title: Good overall, would like 2 zippers in side pouches
customer_reviews.text: Good product. A little disappointed that the side pouches only have 1 zipper per pouch, as opposed to the main compartment with 2. I use this as a bag for EMS and it would be great to have access from the top with 2 zippers.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Curb

customer_reviews.title: My best work/gym bag
customer_reviews.text: I started using it the day I received it, and I love it. I use it to go to work then to go to the gym after. I am able to fit everything I need for work, gym equipment, a change of clothes, all of my shakers, my pre-workout, my large protein bottle, shower shoes, work shoes, gym shoes and all of my shower supplies with still a ton of room to spare. I have not had a problem with the straps yet, like many have complained about.The bag feels really reliable and the color is great!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Really cheap material!
customer_reviews.text: The clips that hold the shoulder straps to the bag are made of the cheapest material in the world. I used this bag for approximately 1 week and one day as I was leaving the gym, the straps just came off! I looked at it and realized that the clips had just bent beyond recognition and couldn't hold the bad anymore! It makes no sense, at most I had a pair of sneakers, gym clothes, and a towel in the bag. What are these clips made of? Will be asking for a full refund. Extremely disapointed!
customer_reviews.author: Zeeshan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bag in three colors. Each one worked great. Some people noticed a plastic smell--after keeping them open for a couple days, that smell goes away entirely--anything you order that has a vinyl interior coating will smell like that. Wasn't an issue at all. The zippers worked great, the construction is tough. Large enough to pack for one person four days of clothes. NOT A GYM BAG unless you're packing all your sports gear as well. For travel and overnighters it's super.
customer_reviews.author: April McGowan

customer_reviews.title: Good bag
customer_reviews.text: I used this with my band equipment as a dedicated bag to hold cables relating to my stage lights. Worked great for it. I also got a black one for power cables / extension cords, also doing an excellent job for that.
customer_reviews.author: jenksdrummer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag well over a year ago. It is a perfect size without being bulky. It's great for overnight or for a few days. It is very durable and I like the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Irene S.

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made bag. Used it once and the hooks on the bag spread apart where it almost detached from the entire bag. I had to make shift it so I could carry it for the remainder of my trip. Most likely I could squeeze it back together if I had my Gerber with me but the manufactures should have taken that into consideration. It shouldn’t be my job.
customer_reviews.author: McBreezy10

customer_reviews.title: You get a bag and... sunglasses?
customer_reviews.text: Despite being in the picture, getting the sunglasses was a surprise. Why'd they send me sunglasses? I bought a bag. They could've included something more complementary, like a travel lock, or a smaller tote, or some ziplocs. But whatever. The bag fabric is loose enough to fold easily but not so flimsy that it crumples when not stuffed. I use it to hold the things that used to be in my trunk but are now in my hatchback behind-the-seat space. It fits a decent amount of stuff without taking up too much space itself. No complaints yet. I use the glasses to look cool. Complaints pending.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bag! Got it for all my martial arts stuff and it's the perfect size. Fits my gi and belts in the main compartment and the side compartments are the perfect size for my boxing gloves, wrist wraps, cloth tape, mouth guard, water bottle, etc... Been holding up very well the last couple months I'm actually planning on getting a second navy blue bag for all my Fire Department gear when I staff the station. Can't go wrong for $15! Another great Amazon find!
customer_reviews.author: Vacho

customer_reviews.title: ROOMY GYM BAG, STURDY, JUST AS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: i received this bag promptly, I was looking for a cheaper gym bag that had enough room for towels, toiletries, shoes and a change of clothes for my husband who goes to the gym during work hours. The bag looks exactly as in the picture, has a lot of pockets and compartments that allow you to store a variety of items without putting everything together. The clasps of the shoulder strap seem sturdy as well and should guarantee longevity. I will update my review once the bag has been used for a while to see how it's holding up, but for now I am really satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Alice_C

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good quality
customer_reviews.text: For the boyfriend, for his weekend guys trip, since he brings clothes to my house in grocery bags. lol! Was looking for something not super cheap/ cheaply made and not super expensive/ fancy. It was right in between. Fabric is pretty soft and not stiff. I never really pay attention to the dimensions, and it was bigger than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Denice J.

customer_reviews.title: Tons of ROOM
customer_reviews.text: I bought two, to replace the single one i was using. As noted in other reviews... TONS of room! Love the extra pockets, large enought to fit my 14" chromebook plus lots of other small items. I was a little skeptical after viewing others pics of the broken hooks that connect the strap, but i have had no issues yet. These look great!
customer_reviews.author: CN

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed, plenty of room
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for my driving suit and am replacing a bag that is 9" diameter x 17". The bag seems to be well constructed, zippers of good quality and heavy duty. The center compartment alone is larger than the bag it is replacing and I was able to put the driving shoes in one end compartment and the gloves and other items in the other. My suit along with the NexGen collar fit in the center compartment with plenty of room. (I was jamming my gear into the other bag and struggled with the zipper every time.)
customer_reviews.author: R. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bags!
customer_reviews.text: Great bags! We use them for work. They carry about 15-20 pounds of stuff in them. They’re used most every weekend. Purchased 8 about a year ago and still no signs of stitching pulling loose, straps breaking or zippers doing what they do sometimes. Definitely will be buying again when we need to expand our inventory.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Hillyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag for Traveling
customer_reviews.text: Great bag to travel for a few days. It's large enough to hold quite a lot of clothes, and still be a carry-on bag on airlines.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the price and quick shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag for a weekend trip and it packed every necessity I needed no need for extra carry on bags. It did come with a distinct smell, however it went away after a day or two. Highly recommend this duffel bag to anyone needing it for travel or even a gym bag holds a lot more than it looks!
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Needed this so badly.
customer_reviews.text: I desperately needed a new workout bag, and this fits the bill. It is very roomy, has several pockets and mesh holders, and could even be used as a weekender or overnight bag. It's that spacious. It seems pretty durable, and time will tell. I'm not really familiar with the Everest brand, so for a first time out, they get a thumbs-up from me! If you are like me and need to pack everything for the full day in the morning (items for the office, lunch, occasionally a laptop, on top of workout clothes and water bottles), you'll find that this can handle it all.
customer_reviews.author: L. Wanzer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and roomy, good quality
customer_reviews.text: If this bag is big enough for a teenaged girl to say it's roomy and a great size, you can't really argue with that! Bought this in Navy/Black for my daughter to take on overnights and weekend trips. First, she loves the color, it's different from the standard black, but doesn't stick out like a sore thumb like some of the bright colored bags. Next, she loves the zippered pockets. Her old bag only had one smallish pouch, nowhere to put her dirty clothes or separate clothes from "stuff." She is really happy with this bag and I'll probably be buying another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Justine Uther

customer_reviews.title: The size is great, it's big enough that I was a little ...
customer_reviews.text: The size is great, it's big enough that I was a little worried I would be asked to check it at the gate, but Southwest didn't bat an eye. The material feels durable, the zippers and straps gave no issues. This is a great bag. I've only used this bag once so far, it was a weekend trip so I wasn't taking much and it was less than half full. I think I could have packed a week's worth of clothes and necessities for 1 person, or a weekend's worth of clothes for my family of 4, easily.
customer_reviews.author: Rahul Pawa

customer_reviews.title: Very well made!
customer_reviews.text: I can't even begin to expound on how well this case is made. I use it every day and it takes a beating - but you would never know it. It's strong, sturdy, and has not shown one bit of wear and tear. The zippers are well made with never a problem opening and closing them no matter how full the bag. It wipes off easily and hasn't lost it's new-ness. I would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Ohio Island Resident

customer_reviews.title: Very durable!
customer_reviews.text: This bag has made it through multiple road trips, hospital stays, sports practices, and sleep overs! Great strong material, holds a lot of items and has multiple pockets for your needs!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Venable

product_meta.title: Everest Luggage Sporty Gear Bag - Large, Black, Black, One Size
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackOur signature crossover duffel line with a spacious main compartment and reinforced 600D Polyester. An ideal/optimal bag for any workout or travel gear. 


 * QUALITY High quality 600D Polyester, professionally weaved seams offer long-lasting use. 
 * DIMENSIONS 25" x 12" x 12" (LxWxH)
 * CAPACITY3140 cu in / 55.9 L
 * WEIGHT 2 lbs 12 oz / 1.2 kg 


About Us
Life is a journey to the peak of the highest mountain - This has been our goal and vision since 1982 in creating functional and stylish bags for our daily adventures. We believe bags are an extension of our bodies carrying the many essential items that we need throughout the day. And driven to continue our journey to the peak as our name suggests, we have thoughtfully designed items that feature timeless silhouetts and modern conveniences while maintaining fine regard for detail and quality. Drawing upon more than 30 years of experience, we will continue to craft inspirational and innovative bags to be part of your life's journey.
feature_bullets: Spacious duffel bag with zippered clamshell opening, contrast piping, and dual zippered side compartments with mesh pockets
Joining hook-and-loop top handles and removable/adjustable cross-body strap with padded shoulder

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,292 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
